thread.title: BRIEF-Shandong Zhonglu Oceanic Fisheries sees FY 2017 net profit up 71.2 pct to 99.7 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shandong Zhonglu Oceanic Fisheries sees FY 2017 net profit up 71.2 pct to 99.7 pct

organizations.name: shandong zhonglu oceanic fisheries co ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Shandong Zhonglu Oceanic Fisheries Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 71.2 percent to 99.7 percent, or to be 90 million yuan to 105 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 52.6 million yuan
* Comments that increased price of fish and income of tuna purse seine as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/U2brBr
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
